keyPolicies.policyDescription: Broxtowe's vote to leave has been ignored by the current MP. Only the Conservatives can get Brexit done - so we can invest in our NHS, schools and police.
Let's make the most of Broxtowe's green corridors for cycle routes. Encouraging cleaner and greener communities and options for commuters.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support investment into the Queens Medical Centre
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Our NHS is vitally important to all of us. We need more front-line investment, so our local hospitals are fit for purpose for patients and staff alike.
Securing our fair share from the Government's Towns Fund initiative - to regenerate Stapleford Town Centre and boost local business in Broxtowe.
Our children and grandchildren deserve the best education possible – including better access to alternative training like apprenticeships.
Securing Broxtowe's fair share of the 20,000 extra police officers we'll recruit. We need more police on the beat to keep our streets safe.

issues.brexitEurope: Broxtowe's vote to leave has been ignored by the current MP. Only the Conservatives can get Brexit done - so we can invest in our NHS, schools and police.
issues.economy: Investing in our High Streets - Securing our fair share from the Government's Towns Fund initiative - to regenerate Stapleford Town Centre and boost local business in Broxtowe.
issues.education: More funding for schools - Our children and grandchildren deserve the best education possible – including better access to alternative training like apprenticeships.
issues.environment: Protect our local environment - Let's make the most of Broxtowe's green corridors for cycle routes. Encouraging cleaner and greener communities and options for commuters.
issues.health: Support investment into the Queens Medical Centre - Our NHS is vitally important to all of us. We need more front-line investment, so our local hospitals are fit for purpose for patients and staff alike.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Sylvia Gillespie-Bell, on behalf of Darren Henry, both at Broxtowe Conservative Association, 146 Station Rd, Beeston, Nottingham, NG9 2AY. Printed by Staffordshire Outlook, Tamworth, Mercian Way, Quarry Hill, Wilnecote, Derbyshire, DE7 4RA
